title: Disclosure.1994.DVDRip.XviD.AR
description:
Disclosure (1994)

Director:
Barry Levinson
Writers (WGA):
Michael Crichton (novel)
Paul Attanasio (screenplay)

Genre:
Drama / Thriller

Plot Outline:With his company about to merge, a happily married and successful computer expert is expecting a promotion. Instead the job goes to a woman from another plant with whom he had an affair in his bachelor days. His new boss, not only dangerously sexy but equally dangerously ambitious, tries to pick up where they left off but he just about manages to resist. As his position at work comes under increasing pressure he decides to file charges of sexual harassment. This is the last thing the company needs.

Cast

Furillo (Joseph Attanasio)
